Text: I haven't yet completed the download, can you tell me what format this is in? You say in the description that it's usb advance ready but I have a ModBo 4.0 so I'm curious as to whether or not this can be converted to an ISO and burnt to a DVD
A seed would also be nice..getting nothing from the torrent file nor via magnet link

One seed in the swarm for openbittorrent, yet doesn't even attempt to connect. I know the torrent is old but this just sucks not seeing a connection attempt when there is a seed, whomever it is.

Nothing from the torrent file via azureus 2.4.0.2 nor from magnet using utorrent 3.1.2 :(

Sad, yet another very hard to find game torrent dead.

The one "seed" only occasionally shows up in the swarm, but never connects to any peers.

Will have to order a used copy of this from gamestop unfortunately, my original just won't play anymore :/
